template.description: Ingestion process: -> get records from ES index -> annotate free text using MedCATService (uses scripts, see user-scripts) -> ingest annotations in a separate index back into ES, the annotations having as ID the original DOC_ID plus an annotation_ID : doc_id_annotation_id, concat of the fields "meta.id" and "nlp.id" , meta.id_nlp.id
template.name: OpenSearch_ingest_annotate_ES_MedCATService_to_ES
